Title: rmBoink
Description: rmBoink provides sound notifications for NationStates Regional Message Board posts.
HomeWiki:
rmBoink

windows RMB sound alerts for NationStates

rmBoink provides sound alerts every time someone in your NationStates region posts a message to the Regional Message Board. No NS++? No always-open browser window? No worries. rmBoink sits quietly in the background on your computer and will play a sound to you every time your region has a new message on the RMB.

Features

  • Plays sound for any region's RMB on new message
  • No need to enter NS account information
  • Configurable interval for updates
  • Customizable .wav or .mp3 sound
  • Easy setup wizard and built-in instructions
  • Popups on desktop for messages (EXPERIMENTAL - may not work on some platforms)
  • Ignore nations (prevent them from causing a Boink)
